Marazzi is a well-known brand in the global tiles industry. With representation in more than 140 countries, Marazzi has secured its position as a trusted quality manufacturer of ceramic tiles and represents the worldwide appreciated Italian style of interior design.

Marazzi USA is the North American subsidiary of Marazzi Group, based in Italy. Founded by Filippo Marazzi, the grandson of Marazzi Group’s founder, Marazzi USA established the first Italian-owned ceramic manufacturing plant in the United States, located in Sunnyvale, Texas.
